text:
Where has this stuff been all my life? I keep trying this for various things and it's helped with all of them so far.

A tiny bit on my face before bed. Now my face is soft.
Dry, calloused feet? A tiny bit rubbed on my feet then slept in socks. Now my feet are softer.
Ladies with "chafing issues" - coconut oil to the rescue.
I have not tried it on my hair yet.

My other jar is in the kitchen. It's great in coffee and gives scrambled eggs a whole new taste. I think it would be great on a waffle. That's next.
